forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B), permutation (map f l1) l2 -> exists l3 : list A, permutation l3 l1 /\ l2 = map f l3

Related definitions and lemmas:
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
permutation_map_ex_aux : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list B) (l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> l1 = map f l3 -> exists l4 : list A, permutation l4 l3 /\ l2 = map f l4
permutation_cons_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) l2 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation l1 (l3 ++ l4)
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
permutation_cons_ex_aux : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall l11 l12 : list A, l1 = l11 ++ a :: l12 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation (l11 ++ l12) (l3 ++ l4)
same_length_ex : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A) (l3 : list B), length (l1 ++ a :: l2) = length l3 -> exists (l4 l5 : list B) (b : B), length l1 = length l4 /\ length l2 = length l5 /\ l3 = l4 ++ b :: l5
app_inv_head : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), l1 ++ l2 = l1 ++ l3 -> l2 = l3
app_inv_tail : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), l2 ++ l1 = l3 ++ l1 -> l2 = l3
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
map_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), map f (l1 ++ l2) = map f l1 ++ map f l2
app_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: l4)
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
permutation_app_swap : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (l1 ++ l2) (l2 ++ l1)
permutation_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)
permutation_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) -> permutation l1 l2
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
split_one_in_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 : list A), In a l1 -> exists l2 : list A, In (a, l2) (split_one l1)
map_rev : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f (rev l) = rev (map f l)
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = a :: nil -> l2 = a :: nil
split_one_permutation : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), In (a, l1) (split_one l2) -> permutation (a :: l1) l2
permutation_transposition : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l1 ++ b :: l2 ++ a :: l3)
in_permutation_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 : list A, permutation (a :: l1) l
concat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list (list A)), map f (concat l) = concat (map (map f) l)
flat_map_concat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l : list A), flat_map f l = concat (map f l)
